::Iron Raptor::

Iron Raptor watches Megaton struggle with the imaginary cage, her 
expression remaining the same. He had blaimed it on the mutants, so it 
might be them that's causing it, but nonetheless it didn't make 
Megaton look too good.

"I already gave you a suggestion," she says to Megaton, "We'll agree 
to a cease-fire, but nothing beyond that."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Megaton flinched back at Iron Raptors directness. "I assure you Iron 
Raptor. there is no need for such hostility, If you don't like my 
offer than perhaps there is some way you could profit from an 
arangement. The mutant wasn't going to take no for an answer, "I'm a 
reasonable leader willing to listen to any suggestion you have to make 
th
